name: TC-019: User select option "Don't remind me again" in the modal "Publish page" for PRODUCT page

steps.name: Save and Publish new PRODUCT page from blank and select Don't remind me again in the modal Publish page

attachments.name: Open website with URL: https://admin.shopify.com/store/quynhquynhiee/apps/wip-pagefly/pages

steps.name: Switch to Frame by Name: app-iframe
Wait for the page listing to be loaded

attachments.name: Get text of element By.xpath: //h1[@class='Polaris-Header-Title']
==> The Text is: Pages

steps.name: Verify element visible By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create from template']
Verify element visible By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create blank page']
Create a new PRODUCT page from blank

Switch to Frame by Name: pf-sandbox

steps.name: Verify element NOT present [[ChromeDriver: chrome on mac (c47ce586a8ae842c7b142124044d6be2)] -> xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]]
Select Don't remind option and confirm 'Publish product page' modal
Verify text Publish product page of element [Contains] By.xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]

attachments.name: Get text of element By.xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]

==> The Text is: Publish product page
After publishing, this product page will be applied to assigned product. You can view it by going to one of the assigned product pages on your live store.
All selected product pages will be replaced. To revert back to your original product page, just unpublish this page.
Don't remind me again
Cancel
Publish
Get text of element By.xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]

==> The Text is: Publish product page
After publishing, this product page will be applied to assigned product. You can view it by going to one of the assigned product pages on your live store.
All selected product pages will be replaced. To revert back to your original product page, just unpublish this page.
Don't remind me again
Cancel
Publish
Verify text of an element [Contains] : true

steps.name: Click on the element By.chained({By.xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1],By.className: Polaris-Checkbox})

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.chained({By.xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1],By.className: Polaris-Checkbox})
Clicked on the element By.xpath: .//*[@role='dialog']//button//*[text()='Publish']

steps.name: Verify element NOT present [[ChromeDriver: chrome on mac (c47ce586a8ae842c7b142124044d6be2)] -> xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]]
Verify element visible By.xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*[@class="Polaris-Frame-Toast"]//*[text()="Page published"] with timeout 30 second
Verify element visible By.xpath: //*[@id="editor-header-bar--status"]//*/span[@class="Polaris-Badge Polaris-Badge--toneSuccess"]//*[text()="Saved"] with timeout 30 second
Verify element visible By.xpath: //*[@id="editor-header-bar--status"]//*/span[@class="Polaris-Badge Polaris-Badge--toneSuccess"]//*[text()="Published"] with timeout 30 second
Verify text Enable autosave? of element [Contains] By.xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]

attachments.name: Get text of element By.xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]

==> The Text is: Enable autosave?
Enabling autosave allows you to automatically save any changes made to the current page. Learn more
Autosaving will not create new versions in version history. To create one, you need to manually save your progress in the editor.
Don't remind me again
Cancel
Enable
